def_en: To disconnect a piece of equipment means to separate it from its source of power or to break a connection that it needs in order to work.

def_cn: (通常指因欠费而)切断(煤气、水、电或者电话)
def_en: If you are disconnected by a gas, electricity, water, or telephone company, they turn off the connection to your house, usually because you have not paid the bill.
If you disconnect something from something else, you separate the two things.
